claims.object: A type of radiatively inefficient accretion flow model
Energy of hot gas being advected into the black hole rather than radiated away

surface_layer.definition: A type of accretion flow model where energy is transported into the black hole rather than radiated.

deep_layer.mechanism: Energy transport is dominated by advection, meaning that energy is carried along with the inflowing gas.

epistemic_metadata.source: Sagittarius A* - The Milky Way Supermassive Black Hole
